notes: The problem is to write a PEST test to check the functionality of the CountTokens action in the Laravel application.
test: it('counts the tokens with default model', function () {$action = new \App\Actions\CountTokens();$result = $action->execute('This is a test string.');expect($result)->toBe(5)});it('counts the tokens with custom model', function () {$action = new \App\Actions\CountTokens();$result = $action->execute('This is a test string.', 'gpt-4');expect($result)->toBe(5);});
